text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump So, let's review: if the US has completed 5 COVID-19 tests out of a total of 100 people and another country (Canada, hypothetically) has tested 4 out of a total of 10 people; the US has completed more tests; HOWEVER, per capita, Canada has tested 40% of people and the US only 5%.
